goals.description: Address unrecovered Conversion Rates (CR) and declining Active Order Rates (AOR)
Maintain Free Add-on take rates over 90%
Improve empty conversions and acceptance rates through Charge at Checkout

key_results.metric: Active user free add-on take rate

in_scope: Reactivation page iterations (cadence change, reschedule features)
Free Add-on persistence and selection improvements
deprioritized: Pricing Value Experiment (pushed from H2 2025 to 2026)

dependencies.description: CRM technical blocker for OTP MVP
ProcessOut integration for better payment capabilities
CDP v2 for fixing data lag
Legal compliance initiatives in cancellation funnel

risks.risk: Capacity constraints due to parental leave and backfills (3 parental, 2 backfills in Q1)
risks.mitigation: Hiring 2 FE devs + 1 BE dev in Q2; personnel returning (Bolo & Richa) in Q2

risks.risk: Insufficient resource planning for adhoc and technical initiatives
risks.mitigation: Better proactive accounting for technical initiatives and adhoc work in planning

risks.risk: Delayed iterations preventing business value realization
risks.mitigation: Allocate more space for iterations vs. new initiatives

risks.risk: OTP launch delay due to technical investigation and capacity constraints
risks.mitigation: Proper technical solution instead of MVP hack; launch targeted for W2 2026

risks.risk: Limited ability to scale OTP marketing without proper attribution
risks.mitigation: Build data scalability post-test if results are positive

risks.risk: Team re-learning technical context when iterations are too spaced out

initiatives: Multi-add-on pop-up on funnel and reactivation
